headline.main: FREE FRENCH CONGO HAILS U.S. MISSION; Brazzaville Natives Mark the Event With American Flags and National Anthem LIGHT PLANE NEED VOICED Leader of Visiting Group Also Urges More War Equipment -- Aid Ships at Pointe Noire

lead_paragraph: BRAZZAVILLE, Middle Congo, French Equatorial Africa, Oct. 13 (Delayed) -- An American flag is being flown here. It was fashioned by well-intentioned if untutored native labor.
abstract: Brazzaville, French Equatorial Africa, welcomes U S mission
